devdoc.author: David Lucid <david@rari.capital> (https://github.com/davidlucid) Changes by Citrus team: - added base currency - added guardian to circuit break oracle

NewDefaultOracle(address,address).details: Event emitted when the default oracle is changed.

NewOracle(address,address,address).details: Event emitted when an underlying token's oracle is changed.

changeAdmin(address).details: Changes the admin and emits an event.

params.underlyings: The underlying ERC20 token addresses those `oracles` should be cleared.

params._admin: The admin who can assign oracles to underlying tokens.

returns._0: Price in base currency of the token underlying `cToken`, scaled by `10 ** (36 - underlyingDecimals)`.

price(address).details: Attempts to return the price in base currency of `underlying` (implements `BasePriceOracle`).

guardian.details: The guardian who can unset oracle in case it's misbehaving

oracles.details: Maps underlying token addresses to `PriceOracle` contracts (can be `BasePriceOracle` contracts too).

devdoc.title: MasterPriceOracle

baseCurrency().notice: all other tokens are priced against the base token. Its price is 1e18

getUnderlyingPrice(address).notice: Returns the price in base currency of the token underlying `cToken`.

userdoc.notice: Use a combination of price oracles.
